General.Name: Xinjiang Tianshun Supply Chain Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Tianshun Supply Chain Co., Ltd. provides logistic services in China. The company offers supply chain management, third party logistics, international air cargo and logistics, and logistics park operation services. Xinjiang Tianshun Supply Chain Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Ürümqi, China.

4.Name: Mr. Xiang  Gao
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
